page.title: 10Recreation-Slyne with Hest
page.content: In Slyne with Hest common pastimes include football,rugby,tennis,badminton ,bowling,jogging and fishing.In the middle of Slyne with Hest there is a recreation ground where various sports are played.For the older generation there is a bowling green.Also in Morecambe there is a golf course.For the younger generation there are football piches,tennis courts,childrens playground and cricket pitches.In Morecambe there is a park called Happy Mount Park.There are trampolines, climbing frames,mini golf,crazy golf, tennis and others.Many people fish in the canals.Some of the fish are carp, bream,eels,rudd,pike,tench,ruffe and many others.
